heading: choppers bound for balkans
subheading: the pentagon is sending two dozen tank-killing apache helicopters backed by ground-based missiles and rockets to join the campaign against serbian forces. a spokesman said the helicopter deployment was "absolutely not" a step toward an attack by nato ground troops in kosovo. about 2,000 soldiers will be deployed with the new force in albania.
author: wired staff
text: the pentagon is sending two dozen tank-killing apache helicopters backed by ground-based missiles and rockets to join the campaign against serbian forces. a spokesman said the helicopter deployment was "absolutely not" a step toward an attack by nato ground troops in kosovo. about 2,000 soldiers will be deployed with the new force in albania.
